/usr/bin/c++   -O2 -g -DNDEBUG   CMakeFiles/sph.dir/src/main.cpp.o  -o sph -rdynamic /usr/local/lib/libmpi_cxx.so /usr/local/lib/libmpi.so /usr/local/lib/libboost_mpi.so /usr/local/lib/libboost_system.so /usr/local/lib/libboost_filesystem.so /usr/local/lib/libboost_serialization.so -Wl,-Bstatic -ladios -Wl,-Bdynamic -lm -lmxml -libverbs -lz -lbz2 -lpthread -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib:
